Text: The Michael J. Fox Show was an American television sitcom starring Michael J. Fox.

Text: The Michael J. Fox Show:  The series aired on NBC in the United States from September 26, 2013, to January 23, 2014, as part of the 2013–14 American television season.

<Text: The Michael J. Fox Show:  Fox made his regular return to television for the first time since he was on ABC's "Spin City".>
